body.name: Maxi-Cosi Emme 360 All-in-One Convertible Car Seat, 360¡ FlexiSpin Rotational Seat, from Birth to Ten Years (5-100 lbs): Rear-Facing, Forward-Facing, & Belt-Positioning Booster, Desert Wonder
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 48 mins
features: EMME 360 ROTATING ALL-IN-ONE CONVERTIBLE CAR SEAT––MADE TO EVOLVE WITH YOUR CHILD Getting your little one in and out of the car is easier than ever with 360° FlexiSpin technology, which allows you to swivel the car seat in all modes of use.

TENSIONFIX SOLVES THE MOST COMMON INSTALLATION PROBLEM 7 out of 10 parents unknowingly have loose vehicle belt tension. Maxi-Cosi’s TensionFix is our patent-pending red-to-green tension-sensitive indicator that shows you when your belt has tension.

EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN MEETS EVERY STANDARD Emme meets or exceeds all federal safety standards and is National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) compliant. Attached connection cord ensures that base and seat must be used together when installed.
GETTING A GOOD FIT IS SWIFT AND SIMPLE The Emme 360 Rotating All-in-One Convertible Car Seat also has a built-in vehicle belt lock-off arm that helps you get a secure fit during installation.

INSTALL THE BASE JUST ONCE Convenience is important when it comes to traveling with your little one. With the Emme 360, base installation is the same for all 3 modes of use, alleviating the need to re-install the car seat as your child grows.

1 CAR SEAT FOR EVERY STAGE The Emme 360 evolves with your child as they grow. From birth to 10 years in all 3 modes of use: rear-facing (5–40 lbs., 19”–40”), forward-facing (22–65 lbs., 29”–49”), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs., 43”–52”).

SUPPORTED FROM THE START WITH PURECOSI Our premium PureCosi fabrics are made without wool or added fire retardant treatment, which is better for your child and our planet. All fabric and cushions can be removed and are machine-washable.

DESIGNED FOR COMPLETE COMFORT The soft, plush infant head pillow and cushions provide extra support and remove easily for washing or when baby is ready to ride without them. ReclineFit provides 5 reclining positions for ultimate relaxation.

QUICK IS KEY Our ClipQuik Magnetic Chest Clip is designed for fast, struggle-free buckling. The QuikFit 10-position headrest and harness adjust for every growth stage, and the removable QuikClean seat pad insert is machine-washable for easy cleaning.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES YOU’LL LOVE Convenient harness holders for easier in-and-out. 2 removable, dishwasher-safe cup holders rotate to accommodate sippy cups of various shapes and styles.
body.description: INTRODUCING EMME 360TM WITH 360° FLEXISPIN Getting your child in and out of the car is easier than ever with our 360° FlexiSpin rotational seat. 360° FlexiSpin rotational technology allows you to swivel the car seat so you can remove your child from the car with less back strain. Additionally, we’ve solved the most common car seat installation problem that 7 out of 10 parents unknowingly have loose vehicle belt tension. Maxi-Cosi’s TensionFixTM is our patent-pending red-to-green tension-sensitive indicator that shows you when your belt is tight. Emme 360TM evolves with your child through all of life’s stages, from birth to 10 years. Travel with confidence in all 3 modes: rear-facing (5–40 lbs.), forward-facing (22–65 lbs.), and belt-positioning booster (40–100 lbs.).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EMME 360 ROTATING ALL-IN-ONE CAR SEAT INTRODUCING EMME 360 ROTATING ALL-IN-ONE CAR SEAT Getting your child in and out of the car is easier than ever with our 360° FlexiSpin rotational seat. 360° FlexiSpin rotational technology allows you to swivel the car seat so you can remove your child from the car with less back strain. Additionally, we’ve solved the most common car seat installation problem that seven out of ten parents unknowingly have—loose vehicle belt tension. Maxi-Cosi’s TensionFixTM is our patent-pending red-to-green tension-sensitive indicator that shows you when your belt is tight. Emme 360TM evolves with your child through all of life’s stages, from birth to ten years. Travel with confidence in all three modes: rear-facing (5-40 pounds), forward-facing (22-65 pounds), and belt-positioning booster (40-100 pounds).

EASY IN. EASY OUT. LESS BACK STRAIN. Getting your child in and out of the car is easier than ever with our 360° FlexiSpin rotational seat design. Our 360° FlexiSpin rotational technology allows you to swivel the car seat so you can easily remove your child from the car with less back strain
ONE CAR SEAT FOR EVERY AGE AND STAGE Rear-Facing 5-40 pounds Forward-Facing 22-65 pounds Belt-Positioning Booster 40-100 pounds

The Details Install with Ease: TensionFix We’ve solved the most common car seat installation problem that seven out of ten parents unknowingly have—loose vehicle belt tension. Maxi-Cosi’s TensionFix is our patent-pending red-to-green tension-sensitive indicator that shows you when your belt is tight. Rotating Cup Holders Innovative cup holder design rotates to accommodate sippy cups of various shapes and styles. Cupholders are removable and dishwasher safe. Premium. Plush. PureCosi Our super-soft PureCosi fire-resistant fabrics and foam are made without wool or added fire retardant treatments which is better for your child and our planet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Son is so comfy, rotating feature is great
reviews.reviewText: First, I want to address the reviews stating that the latch to rotate the car seat is getting "stuck". I, too, though it was getting stuck at first and was so disappointed! However, after messing with it more, you will come to realize it is not getting stuck at all. You have to press all your fingers down with equal pressure on the latch for it to actually let the car seat turn. If you do this, it will work every time. To me, this is a safety feature! If you have had your eye on this car seat, do not be discouraged by the feedback saying the turning mechanism gets stuck; it does not. My only feedback would be putting somewhere in the manual a little note to let parents know that you really have to apply pressure to the entire latch for it to engage. My son is so comfy in it he falls asleep within minutes! I have been a faithful Maxi-Cosi customer, and I am so happy with this car seat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter after her baby outgrew her newborn car seat. She wanted something easier to get her baby in & out of the car. Our 1st one had a issue with the track & only turned one direction. Customer service from the company assured us that it was a defect & to return it for another. We did & it works effortlessly. So much easier strapping a baby .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No easy to install. I don’t know how to install it after read Its specification. I was search “ how to install” on youtube. My baby likes it. It looks so comfortable. And It's easy to rotate the car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad design, very difficult to install, manual is not clear, very difficult to get newborn in and out
reviews.reviewText: I'm very disappointed with this thing. It is VERY difficult to install. The seat portion is attached with a steel cable to the base which makes it get in the way of installing. You can't really get it out of the way. It keeps flopping over or pulling the base away when you are trying to install it. There is no documentation how to clip the latches onto the car fixing points. Do they go opening up or opening down ? The strap that goes over the car seat to the back anchor is shown to go between the headrest supports. What if the car has unmovable headrests ? the strap has to go around and tugs the whole thing lopsided. That back strap should be split so it can accommodate cars with fixed headrests. Tightening the straps is also a nightmare. you tighten tighten tighten and it's still a floppy construction. there is no way to adjust the base incline. Ever seen an isofix mechanism ? one click and it's done ! no belts, no straps no fuss.Then there is the whole seat itself. The manual points to the handles on the SIDE to change the incline in rear facing mode. The real latch is in the BACK of the seat. It took me 10 minutes to figure this out. Learn to draw instructions ! The drawing is misleading. The straps for the child have a sticky backing that makes it difficult to get her in properly. The seat is not removable from the base so you can't use it as a child carrier and need to move it to a different carrier.( yet another purchase and cost). The handle to unlatch the rotation is very stiff and in a difficult to reach position. This thing doesn't work. It took us 20 minutes to get the newborn in the set when trying to leave the hospital. The hospital almost did not let us go because we don't have a baby carrier to take her from the room to the car seat (other systems have the seat removable to be used as baby carrier.) Moving this from one car to another is an ordeal. The rotation is a gimmick. It may work in a tall wide SUV with large door opening, in a regular sedan ? not so much. VERY displeased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: We were super excited to find a rotating car seat that had everything we wanted. It had adjustable, cupholders and places to put the straps to keep them out of place. It also rotated, which is huge plus. The car seat is very aesthetically, pleasing and super cushioning.However, there were too many drawbacks. The first thing we noticed was the rotation was really challenging. You had to use two hands, and it often got stuck. While trying to get a good fit on our infant, we noticed a few other downfalls. The straps constantly got tangled and it was a pain to untangle them. Also, there was no way to adjust the crotch buckle. Which made it impossible to get a good fit on our infant. Once the seat was buckled the straps, squeezed his legs and made him very uncomfortable. Per the manual you cannot take out the extra support pillows until kiddo is 30 pounds, so this wasn’t an option to get a better fit. Lastly, the shoulder strap cushions are not removable. They are sewn onto the straps and are very long. In order for us to get a good fit on our little guy we needed to be able to take those off and we weren’t able to. The buttons were also hard to push. This could be because it was a brand new seat. However, there were too many flaws for us to keep the seat. Definitely not worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and rotates really well!
reviews.reviewText: I had no trouble installing this by myself or rotating it by myself. It is heavy - way heavier than any other car seat we’ve owned, so my husband helped with lifting. But once it’s in, it’s easy to install. A simple weave of the seatbelt and latch. I also have no trouble rotating it. Sometime it can be finicky and you have to get a little momentum to get a good spin, but it’s not a problem and totally worth buying!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it now
reviews.reviewText: If you are worried that it’s too expensive, let me tell you it’s worth every penny!!!!My husband is a totally analysis so when it comes to purchasing anything to do with our kids (stroller, car seats, bouncers…) he does an extensive research before buying them so I totally trust his decision.With our oldest, we just went with the traditional maxi cosi and we used it until he grew out of it (almost until 4years old) but our biggest struggle was getting him in. We were so thankful when he was able to pull himself up because we didn’t have to lift him.My husband decided to get this for our second and said it is a life changing! The lift is very minimal because you are not having to turn the baby to face the back and even when your baby is using it as front facing, it’s just that much easier to place your baby inside the car seat.He also mentioned that it comes with many level of elevation, which is very good for the baby as they get older. Able to adjust the elevation as they get older. Totally worth the $$$$$
